text: How to avoid common pitfalls with modern #microservices testing by @edeandrea and @holly_cummins - @Devoxx  https://t.co/NpeNa5bsIk https://t.co/QHjPxhjjWA

author.description: Head of Developer Tools Marketing at @RedHat. Legal thinks you need to know that I'm speaking for myself here. I believe you knew.
